body_html:
Hi @VladislavZavadskyy , I think I know why this didn't work. If you split the data in dim=1, the gather also happens in dim=1 here. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py#L113
So in your example, three tensor with shape (4,10), (4,10), (3,10) is designed for a gather in dim=0. You can tweak the shape a bit to make it work with dim=1.
